publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1556 Rhona Brankin: Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004-That the Parliament welcomes the Chartered Society of Physiotherapy's Physiotherapy Week from 5 to 9 July 2004; notes that 850,000 working days were lost due to musculoskeletal disorders last year in Scotland; recognises the value of workplace physiotherapy in the fight against work-related ill health, and agrees with the Chartered Society of Physiotherapy that prevention is better than cure. Supported by: Linda Fabiani*, Mike Pringle*, Brian Adam*, Sarah Boyack*, Janis Hughes*, Richard Lochhead*, Murdo Fraser*, Richard Baker*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Eleanor Scott*, Pauline McNeill*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bruce Crawford*, Bill Butler*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-1556 Rhona Brankin: Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004-That the Parliament welcomes the Chartered Society of Physiotherapy's Physiotherapy Week from 5 to 9 July 2004; notes that 850,000 working days were lost due to musculoskeletal disorders last year in Scotland; recognises the value of workplace physiotherapy in the fight against work-related ill health, and agrees with the Chartered Society of Physiotherapy that prevention is better than cure. Supported by: Linda Fabiani, Mike Pringle, Brian Adam, Sarah Boyack, Janis Hughes, Richard Lochhead, Murdo Fraser, Richard Baker, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Eleanor Scott, Pauline McNeill, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Rob Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bruce Crawford, Bill Butler, Dr Elaine Murray, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Colin Fox*, Karen Whitefield*, Robert Brown*, Margaret Jamieson*, Christine May*, Stewart Stevenson*, Christine Grahame*, Margaret Mitchell*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Tricia Marwick*, Margo MacDonald*, Cathie Craigie*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-1556 Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004 (lodged on 30 June 2004) Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Rosie Kane*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Fergusson*, Helen Eadie*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1556 Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004 (lodged on 30 June 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1556 Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004 (lodged on 30 June 2004) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Irene Oldfather*
S2M-1556 Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004 (lodged on 30 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1556 Physiotherapy Week - 5 to 9 July 2004 (lodged on 30 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
